snippet: NEW DELHI, India, March 31 (UP)--Mohammed Ali Jinnah, president of the All-India Moslem League, disclosed tonight that he was inviting Mohandas K. Gandhi to a private conference to discuss the partition of India into Moslem and Hindu States....

headline.main: MOSLEM SUGGESTS PARTITION OF INDIA; Jinnah Invites Gandhi to Talk Over Idea of Separate Hindu and Mohammedan States THINKS UNION IMPOSSIBLE Leader Says Islamic Group Is Ready to Give Support to Britain in European War

lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI, India, March 31 (UP)--Mohammed Ali Jinnah, president of the All-India Moslem League, disclosed tonight that he was inviting Mohandas K. Gandhi to a private conference to discuss the partition of India into Moslem and Hindu States.
